about_the_game:
Education app that teaches children how to behave and communicate with other children for with guidance of a parent/therapist.
And simulates situations and problems that the child will have to solve, in addition it gives him moments of relaxation to bring out any negative thought and reinforce positive thinking.
To fully use this app you need to download the app "Cristalix App" on the google play store and make a user and then make a user for the child.

Important to know when using this app - the parent/therapist user must be logged in to the "Cristalix App" in order for the child can log in to is user.

To these who want to try the app there is a demo that does not require a user

-Important to know before use this app
This app supports only Hebrew language updates on this topic will be displayed whenever it has changed.
